lines.text: Hey, Leo- don't you guys have like, magic-detection stuff?
Like, some way to detect magical energy being given off?
Maybe you'd have been able to tell if any sort of contact with the underworld was happening when you showed up?
Kid, if we had anythin' like that, my job would be a heck of a lot easier.
Hrm. So we can't tell one way or the other, then.
